item.title: Dice help [pi]
item.dc:creator: @ultimateGodz ultimateGodz
item.description:
@ultimateGodz wrote:

so my source kinda blocked the dices… and im not sure what to change in itemclick… here my code maybe u can help me out?

[code]
@Override
public void processPacket(Client c, int packetType, int packetSize) {
int junk = c.getInStream().readSignedWordBigEndianA();
int itemSlot = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWordA();
int itemId = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWordBigEndian();
if (itemId != c.playerItems[itemSlot] - 1) {
return;

c.sendMessage(“Join a cc first please”);
return;
}
